      • TrainerMultinomial

        public TrainerMultinomial(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer>> categorizedWordCount,
                          java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.io.File[]> categorizedFolder)
        Parameters:
        categorizedWordCount - A map with the class as key and a map as value. The map contains the word and the count of the word in the category.
        categorizedFolder - Contains a map of the category as the key and an array of Files as value.

        public void run()
         throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        This method will create a baseline for the interactive learner. It will create a probMap with all the words and its probability, per category
